## Events.ViewportChange class

Notifies listeners that the workspace surface's position or scale has changed.

Does not notify when the workspace itself resizes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ViewportChange extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events_namespace.uibase_class.md)

|  [oldScale?](./blockly.events_namespace.viewportchange_class.oldscale_property.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The previous scale of the workspace. |
|  [scale?](./blockly.events_namespace.viewportchange_class.scale_property.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The scale of the workpace. |
|  [type](./blockly.events_namespace.viewportchange_class.type_property.md) |  | EventType |  |
|  [viewLeft?](./blockly.events_namespace.viewportchange_class.viewleft_property.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The left edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the workspace origin. |
